evil insults neuro: Evil insults Neuro, e.g. saying she doesn't like Neuro's "goody two shoes" attitude
evil swears: Evil swears at any point during the stream
evil makes actual joke: Evil says an actual funny joke
evil makes strange noise: Evil's TTS acts up and outputs a strange sound. Usually happens with punctuation
evil mentions being evil: Evil mentions that she's evil and not good
evil trauma dump: Evil trauma dumps, most likely about her birthday and how no-one attended
evil meows: Evil meows at any point during the stream
